django.contrib.postgres.apps
============================

.. py:module:: django.contrib.postgres.apps


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.postgres.apps.PostgresConfig


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.contrib.postgres.apps.uninstall_if_needed


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: uninstall_if_needed(setting, value, enter, **kwargs)

   Undo the effects of PostgresConfig.ready() when django.contrib.postgres
   is "uninstalled" by override_settings().


.. py:class:: PostgresConfig

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.apps.AppConfig`


   .. py:attribute:: name
      :value: 'django.contrib.postgres'



   .. py:attribute:: verbose_name


   .. py:method:: ready()
